short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides suggestion bar and disables autoplay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Completely hides all videos marked as watched on the subscription list and tile views. Also reduces the sidebar to the single autoplay option, removing all other related and recommended videos.
